LanguageData.SimpleAnimalProsthetics.label: Animal Prosthetics
LanguageData.SimpleAnimalProsthetics.description: Adapt the designs of human prosthetics for universal animal use. Animal prostheses are cheaper to build than their human counterparts, but also perform a tiny bit worse.
LanguageData.AnimalBionics.label: Animal Bionics
LanguageData.AnimalBionics.description: Adapt the designs of human bionics for universal animal use. Animal bionics are cheaper to build than their human counterparts, but also perform a tiny bit worse.
